Q_DESC: The tower of hanoi is a mathematical puzzle. It consists of threerods, and a number of disks of different sizes which can slideonto any rod. The puzzle starts with the disks in a neat stack in ascending order of size on one rod, the smallest at the top. We have to obtain the same stack on the third rod. Write a program using recursive function.
TESTCASE_1:
3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
 Move disk 1 from peg A to peg C
 Move disk 2 from peg A to peg B
 Move disk 1 from peg C to peg B
 Move disk 3 from peg A to peg C
 Move disk 1 from peg B to peg A
 Move disk 2 from peg B to peg C
 Move disk 1 from peg A to peg C
TESTCASE_2:
2
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Move disk 1 from peg A to peg B
 Move disk 2 from peg A to peg C
 Move disk 1 from peg B to peg C
TESTCASE_3:
1
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
 Move disk 1 from peg A to peg C
